snippet.name: New Config XML
snippet.starttext:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <Config xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="http://www.luismajano.com/projects/coldbox/schema/config_1.1.0.xsd"> <Settings> <Setting name="AppName" value="$${Application name}"/> <Setting name="AppMapping" value="$${Application Mapping (From web root or CFMX Mapping)}" /> <Setting name="DebugMode" value="$${Debug Mode:true|false}" /> <Setting name="DebugPassword" value="$${Debug Password}"/> <Setting name="EnableDumpVar" value="$${Enable DumpVar:true|false}" /> <Setting name="EnableColdfusionLogging" value="$${Enable Coldfusion Logging:true|false}" /> <Setting name="EnableColdboxLogging" value="$${Enable Coldbox Logging:true|false}" /> <Setting name="ColdboxLogsLocation" value="$${Coldbox Logs Location (Blank if not used):logs}" /> <Setting name="DefaultEvent" value="$${Default Event Handler}"/> <Setting name="RequestStartHandler" value="$${Request Start Handler (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="RequestEndHandler" value="$${Request End Handler (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="ApplicationStartHandler" value="$${Application Start Handler (Blank if not used)}" /> <Setting name="OwnerEmail" value="$${Owner Email (Outgoing Account)}" /> <Setting name="EnableBugReports" value="$${Enable Bug Reports:true|false}"/> <Setting name="UDFLibraryFile" value="$${UDF Library File (Blank if not used)}" /> <Setting name="CustomErrorTemplate" value="$${Custom Error Template (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="ExceptionHandler" value="$${Exception Handler (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="MessageboxStyleClass" value="$${Messagebox Style Class (Blank if not used)}"/> <Setting name="HandlersIndexAutoReload" value="$${Handlers Index Auto Reload:true|false}"/> <Setting name="ConfigAutoReload" value="$${Config Auto Reload:true|false}"/> <Setting name="MyPluginsLocation" value="$${Custom Plugins Invocation Path}" /> </Settings>
<YourSettings>
</YourSettings>
<!--Optional,if blank it will use the CFMX administrator settings.--> <MailServerSettings> <MailServer>$${Mail Server (Blank if using CFMX Settings)}</MailServer> <MailUsername>$${Mail Username (Blank if not used)}</MailUsername> <MailPassword>$${Mail Password (Blank if not used)}</MailPassword> </MailServerSettings>
<BugTracerReports>
</BugTracerReports>
<DevEnvironments>
</DevEnvironments>
<WebServices>
</WebServices>
<Layouts> <DefaultLayout>$${Default Layout File:Layout.Main.cfm}</DefaultLayout> </Layouts>
<i18N>
</i18N>
<Datasources>
</Datasources>
</Config>
